text: Diggah Nabii Mucammad {czateýķe ummatak Yallaa kee kay farmoyta Nabii Mucammad Azafeiķe nummayse maraay, yahuud deqsita maraay, saabi-iin deqsita maray cutuuka yaqbudeey, nasaará deqsita maray maqtab yaqbudeey, majuus deqsita maray girá yaqbudeey, Yallat agleyta haa mara, diggah Yalli ken fan Qhiyaamah ayró inkih baxsele, diggah Yalli ummaanim yableeh isi ginóh taamoomi dacrisah, ummaan mara le galtóh galtamkeh}
